This post is troll. Bestgirlx harasses a lot of girl streamers. Tbh don't take anything she says seriously.

Gg go next.

What an awesome surprise to see one of my favorite streamers, Dumplings, on the creator spotlight. I am so happy she is getting the attention she deserves. She absolutely succeeds in her goal of brightening others' days and has always been a kind person who cares about her community. Keep it up, girl!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} I really like these spotlights.
